subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Richard Petty’s name will remain active in Nascar under a rebranding of the new team created by the merger of his organization with Gillett Evernham Motorsports. The new team will be called Richard Petty Motorsports (R.P.M.), capitalizing on Petty’s marketability. The two race teams had agreed to a partnership that keeps the sponsor-strapped Pettys in racing. Reed Sorenson will drive Petty’s famed No. 43 Dodge for R.P.M. this season. Petty’s No. 44 Dodge will be run by A. J. Allmendinger in at least the first five races of the season as the team tries to find more sponsorship. They will be joined by GEM holdovers Kasey Kahne and Elliott Sadler, who both have full-time rides.
